text: St. Elizabeth Hospital may refer to: == United States == * HSHS St. Elizabeth's Hospital (O'Fallon, IL) * St. Elizabeth Hospital (Appleton, Wisconsin) * St. Elizabeth Hospital, Elizabeth, New Jersey, (1905); In 2000, merged with Elizabeth General Medical Center to form Trinitas Regional Medical Center * St. Elizabeth Hospital (Gonzales, Louisiana) * St. Elizabeth Hospital (Hannibal, Missouri) * St. Elizabeth Hospital in Manhattan, opened in 1890 and now closed * St. Elizabeth Health Services, a private Roman Catholic hospital in Baker City, Oregon * St. Elizabeth's Hospital or St. Elizabeth's Medical Center (Boston) * St. Elizabeths Hospital, Washington, DC * St. Elizabeth Medical Center, Utica, New York, part of the Mohawk Valley Health System (MVHS) * St. Elizabeth's Hospital, Utica, New York, former name of St. Elizabeth Medical Center; the first hospital in Oneida County (1867) * St. Elizabeth Ann Rehabilitation Center of Staten Island, opened in 1993 by the Sisters of Charity of New York. * Saint Elizabeth Community Hospital, Red Bluff, California * St. Elizabeth Youngstown Hospital, Youngstown, Ohio (part of Mercy Health Partners) ==Elsewhere== *St. Elizabeth's Hospital, Hyderabad, Pakistan *St Elizabeth Mission Hospital, South Africa *Sint-Elisabeth Hospital, Willemstad , Curaçao *St. Elizabeth's Hospital, a predecessor of Shanghai Chest Hospital ==See also== *St. Elizabeth Medical Center (disambiguation)
title: St. Elizabeth Hospital
